name: Manzo's Strange Day
description:
<meta property="fb:pages" content="673368892690459" /> Manzo's Strange Day is an ambient game inspired by games like:NightSky, Limbo and Nihilumbra.
While making this game I was focused on Atmospheric Graphics, Simple Art Style,Minimal Plot, Relaxing Gameplay and Relaxing sounds.

-Keys-

Arrow keys-Move

Z-Jump

X-Interact

www.blikzz.tk

-Making-

Tools I Used to make this game where:

Clickteam Fusion 2.5 (a easy to use engine for 2d games)

Aseprite (Aseprite is a pixel-art tool to create 2D animations, sprites, and any kind of graphics for games)

Tiled (A generic tile map editor)
